author: Vertyco
description: Cog profiling tools for bot owners and developers. Attach profilers to cogs and get runtime metrics for their commands and methods.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store data about users.
install_msg:
Thank you for installing!

**DISCLAIMERS**
- This cog overrides attributes of other cogs when profiling.
- It is not recommended to profile more than a couple of cogs at a time.
- If enabling persistent stat saving, make sure to keep globally verbose tracking disabled.
- It is generally better to verbosely track individual methods rather than everything.

To get started, attach a profiler to a cog with `[p]profiler attach <cog>`. Then use `[p]profiler view` to view the metrics.
short: Cog profiling tools for bot owners and developers
